    • Method Detail

      • findNodeByFilter

        Node[] findNodeByFilter(String ldapFilter)
                        throws CiliaIllegalParameterException,
                               CiliaInvalidSyntaxException
        Retreives all nodes matching the filter
        Parameters:
        ldapFilter - , keywords = chain, node, uuid
        Returns:
        array of node matching the filter, array size 0 if no node matching the filter
        Throws:
        CiliaInvalidSyntaxException - , ldap syntax error
        CiliaIllegalParameterException

      • endpointIn

        Node[] endpointIn(String ldapFilter)
                  throws CiliaIllegalParameterException,
                         CiliaInvalidSyntaxException
        Parameters:
        ldapFilter - ldap filters keywords (chain,node,uuid) uuid is relevant only for dynamic components ( SetUp,RawData,Threshold)
        Returns:
        list of adapter In ,
        Throws:
        CiliaInvalidSyntaxException - LDAP syntax error
        CiliaIllegalParameterException - null parameter

      • connectedTo

        Node[] connectedTo(Node node)
                   throws CiliaIllegalParameterException,
                          CiliaIllegalStateException
        Parameters:
        node - node reference
        Returns:
        array of successors , size = 0 if no successor
        Throws:
        CiliaIllegalStateException - the node doesn't exist
        CiliaIllegalParameterException
